# Battle

- [start](#start)
---

## Start

When a user client receives this response it should launch the game (spring.exe) with the start script.

- Endpoint Type: **Event**
- Source: **Server**
- Target: **User**
- Required Scopes: `tachyon.lobby`

### Request

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#",
    "$id": "battle/start/request",
    "scopes": [
        "tachyon.lobby"
    ],
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "type": {
            "const": "request",
            "type": "string"
        },
        "messageId": {
            "type": "string"
        },
        "commandId": {
            "const": "battle/start",
            "type": "string"
        },
        "data": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "username": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "password": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "ip": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "port": {
                    "type": "number"
                }
            },
            "required": [
                "username",
                "password",
                "ip",
                "port"
            ]
        }
    },
    "required": [
        "type",
        "messageId",
        "commandId",
        "data"
    ]
}
```
</details>

<details>
<summary>Example</summary>

```json
{
    "type": "request",
    "messageId": "Ut in",
    "commandId": "battle/start",
    "data": {
        "username": "Ut in",
        "password": "Ut in",
        "ip": "Ut in",
        "port": -57999999.99999999
    }
}
```
</details>

#### TypeScript Definition
```ts
export interface BattleStartRequest {
    type: "request";
    messageId: string;
    commandId: "battle/start";
    data: {
        username: string;
        password: string;
        ip: string;
        port: number;
    };
}
```

```json
{

    "$id": "battle/start/response",
    "scopes": [
        "tachyon.lobby"
    ],
    "anyOf": [
        {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": {
                    "const": "response",
                    "type": "string"

                "messageId": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "commandId": {
                    "const": "battle/start",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "status": {
                    "const": "success",
                    "type": "string"

            },
            "required": [
                "type",
                "messageId",
                "commandId",
                "status"
            ]
        },
        {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": {
                    "const": "response",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "messageId": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "commandId": {
                    "const": "battle/start",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "status": {
                    "const": "failed",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "reason": {
                    "enum": [
                        "game_crashed",
                        "internal_error",
                        "unauthorized",
                        "invalid_request",
                        "command_unimplemented"
                    ]
                }
            },
            "required": [
                "type",
                "messageId",
                "commandId",
                "status",
                "reason"
            ]
        }
    ]
}
```

#### TypeScript Definition
```ts
export interface BattleStartResponse {
    type: "response";
    messageId: string;
    commandId: "battle/start";
    status: "success";
}
```
Possible Failed Reasons: `game_crashed`, `internal_error`, `unauthorized`, `invalid_request`, `command_unimplemented`
